params.query:
SELECT SUBSTR(created_at, 1, 10) AS active_date, COUNT(DISTINCT uid) AS active_users
FROM message 
WHERE created_at >= '2025-10-22 00:00:00.000'
GROUP BY SUBSTR(created_at, 1, 10)
ORDER BY active_date
